Text: Thank you for this upload.  I live in an area that does not have a high def PBS station so I appreciate your efforts.  I hope you will consider the next two episodes of this program.  And if you have any of the Nature series that would be greatly appreciated also.  Thanks again.

This often has one or two seeds (and one or more peers), but it never downloads.  :-(
[Two calendar days, about twenty-four hours connect time!]
